name: Slime Drop
description:
Main Gameplay Loop

- Drop Slimes into the box .

- Merge two Slimes of the same kind to evolve them to the next tier.

- If a slime drops out of the box, you lose.

- Repeat.

Features

- Merge three Slimes of the same kind to skip a tier.

- Chain multiple merges in quick succession to gain a combo multiplier for a higher score.

- Change the colors of the box and the background to your liking.
